chapters.title: Introduction to Financial Technology
chapters.summary: This chapter provides an overview of financial technology, its origins, and its impact on the financial sector. It discusses the key innovations that have revolutionized how financial services are delivered.

chapters.title: The Evolution of Financial Technology
chapters.summary: This chapter delves into the historical evolution of financial technology, from the early days of electronic banking to the rise of fintech startups. It highlights the major milestones and technological advancements that have shaped the industry.

chapters.title: The Role of AI in Financial Technology
chapters.summary: This chapter explores the integration of Artificial Intelligence in financial technology. It discusses how AI is being used to enhance decision-making, improve customer experiences, and automate complex processes within the financial sector.

chapters.title: Algorithms in Financial Technology
chapters.summary: This chapter focuses on the development and application of algorithms in financial technology. It covers topics such as algorithmic trading, risk management algorithms, and the ethical considerations surrounding the use of algorithms in finance.
